title: Wolf Children
writer: Mamoru Hosoda (story), Mamoru Hosoda (screenplay), Satoko Okudera (screenplay)
actors: Aoi Miyazaki, Takao Ohsawa, Haru Kuroki, Yukito Nishii
plot: College student Hana falls in love with another student who turns out to be a werewolf, who dies in an accident after their second child. Hana moves to the rural countryside where her husband grew up to raise her two werewolf children.
